DOC.brief_summary: This study compare safety efficacy three test article foam ( PDI-192 0.1 % Foam , PDI-192 0.15 % Foam , Vehicle Foam ) final commercial product may select future development .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation PDI-192 0.1 % Comparison PDI-192 0.15 % Treatment Mild Moderate Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Subject present clinical diagnosis stable mild moderate atopic dermatitis . Subject use type soap , moisturizers , lotion , cream , ointment , sunscreen skin product , hair product ( shampoo , etc . ) least two week prior study start agrees continue usage product similar frequency entire study . Subject pregnant , lactate plan become pregnant study . Subject require topical systemic medication use topical inflammatory dermatosis therapy could affect course atopic dermatitis study period . Subject use systemic corticosteroid , immunomodulators include leukotriene inhibitor , antimetabolite within 30 day prior study start . Subject use Ultraviolet Light Therapy ( PUVA , UVB , etc . ) within 30 day prior study start . Subject use topical therapy treatment ( may affect ) atopic dermatitis include limited corticosteroid , immunomodulators ( tacrolimus , pimecrolimus , etc . ) , tar , calcipotriene vitamin D preparation , retinoids , antihistamine ( doxepin , diphenhydramine , etc . ) , antibiotic , among others , within 14 day prior study start . Subject desire excessive prolonged exposure ultraviolet light ( e.g. , sunlight , tan bed ) study . Subject use systemic ( oral , IV , etc . ) antibiotic therapy within seven day prior study start . Subject currently enrol investigational drug device study . Subject use investigational drug investigational device treatment within 30 day prior study start .
